jathyantharayen shri lankawata ellawana atham balapam hamuwe indiyawatada yam karyabharayak pawari athi bawa agamathi di. mu. jayarathna mahatha pawasayi.agramathyawaraya penwa denne shri lankawata aasannama rajya lesa indiyawa samanga thawaduratath shakthimath sabandathawak pawathwa ganima itha wadagath bawayi.hethema me bawa kiya sitiye eeye (27) perawaruwe indiya madhya pradesha pradhana amathi shri shiwaraj sin chawhan mahatha samanga agamathi nila niwase pawathi sakachchawakadi ya.me hamuwedi agamathiwaraya penwa dunne rata thula thrasthawadaya awasan kara shri lankawa aluth gamanak aarambha kara athi bawayi janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage shakthi sampanna nayakathwaya hamuwe rata sanwardhanaya kara meheyawana athara thura atham awasthawan hidi jathyantharayen balapam ella wi thibena bawa agamathiwaraya ehidi penwa dunne ya.thaththwaya shri lankawe ananyathawayata tharjanayaki.

aththatama waddan nohoth aadiwasinkiyanne aithihasika urumayak thiyena aawenika sanskruthika lakshana yanthamin ho rakagena sitina janawargayak.mulashra anuwa waddan pawatha enne wanayata palawahala kuweni saha age daru dedena geni.eya sathyayaknam owun wanahi bahuthara lankiya bamunu samajaye asadharana kon kirimata lak wu prathama jiwamana sakshiyayi.namuth bahuthara samajaye siduwu sigra sanskruthika parinamaya hamuwe thama ananyathawaya thawamath yanthamata ho rakagena jiwath wimata owun darana aragalaya khedaniyayi.
